column3: we finally made through the door without being told there is a 45 minute wait.  Came on a Friday morning and we're delighted to find parking and no wait.  Coffee was fresh and not bitter. Mae
column5: was prompt and offered great answers to all of our menu questions.  The pancakes were what we had hoped
column6: fluffy and flavorful.  Breakfast tacos were flavorful
column7: but was disappointed the tortillas had a prepackaged consistency. The spuds deluxe was my favorite item of the morning.  The hash browns were crispy but not dry.  I decided to have them with a runny egg and it was a delicious!!!
